name: The Elite Meme Squad
description:
A quest so stupid that it's still stupid.

The Elite Meme Squad takes place in a highly unrealistic alternate universe where the big electronic companies have trapped most of the population in a virtual world! In this world we find a group of dumbasses who call themselves The Elite Meme Squad, who aspire to be the heroes that save everyone from the virtual world. Join Oostin #1, Myatt, Login, and Oostin #2 as they figure out who's really pulling the strings in this world.
